column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was in town with family
column2: and we wanted to get some deep dish Chicago pizza. Five of us shared one medium and one large pizza. I really enjoyed the pizza
column3: more than I remember enjoying deep dish pizza when I've had it in other (non-Chicago) places. The upstairs dining room was a little crowded
column4: but our waiter was very nice. He even brought us an extra house salad on the house due to a mix-up from downstairs.
